description.en: 1.	Introduction.2.	Mathematical preliminaries for optimal control.3.	Classical linear quadratic optimal control, including regulation & tracking control.4.	Observer based optimal control (LQG control). 5.	Loop shaping and LTR control.  This is a course designed for graduate students which will provide techniques that can help you to design an optimal controller for linear systems with a specific performance index. Concepts such as optimality condition, linear quadratic regulation (LQR), and linear quadratic gaussian (LQG) problem are introduced in the course. In addition, the course also includes the loop shaping concept and the loop transfer recovery (LTR) technique which are frequently used in the modern control.

description.en: Research and development on optical communication networks have matured significantly to the extent that some of these principles are being moved from the research laboratories to the formal (graduate) classroom setting. However, our curriculum has no course to fill this emerging void. A number of institutions have started offering such a course. Additionally, tremendous growth of interest on this topic has been noticed at recent conferences and in recent journal publications. These observations have led me to the decision to design and offer this course.  The most unique feature of this course will be its timeliness to fill a void in an important and emerging networking topic. This course will better prepare our graduate students not only to undertake research in this area but also to handle industry jobs on this topic.

description.zh: 課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
description.en: Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 本課程是介紹工程具有基礎生物催化劑之知識生命之元素。內容包括組織、特性、應用工程及調製。酵素能催化加速反應速度，由於降低活化能。但不能改變化平衡。酵素泛用於工業上，特別在醫藥用途上，很重要。
description.en: This course is to introduce the engineers have basic knowledge of biocalysts-the element of life, including its. Compositions, characteristics, application, engineering, and their preparation. Enzyme can accelate the rate of reaction, by decrease of activation energy. But it could not change chemical equilibrium. Enzyme are widely used in industry and have significant medical application.

description.zh: 介紹化工廠廢棄物對安全、健康、環境之影嚮及化工產品之生命週期評估。舊程序之製程改善及建立完整的廢棄物管理體系，以達廢棄物最少化之目的，新程序之設計則對反應器、分離程序、熱交換器之程序整合及公用設施等，實施源頭減廢及回收，以達潔淨生產之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the safety, health and environmental impact of wastes of chemical process industries and life cycle assessment of chemical engineering products. Waste minimization of existing process through changes in industrial process and setup of waste management hiarachy. For the new process, focus are on the source reduction and recycle of reactors, separators, heat exchange networks and utilities, etc.

description.zh: 本課程將基本物理化學原理應用在材料科學上，探討電子組態、化學鍵及晶體結構間之關係。內容包括晶體結構、X 光繞射分析、相平衡、材料之光學及電學性質及材料表面之鑑定及分析。
description.en: This subject covers the basic principles of physical chemistry and shows how they apply in describing the behavior of the solid state. The relationship between electronic structure, chemical bonding and crystal surface is developed. Attention is also given to characterization of atomic and molecular arrangements in materials as well as quantum optical and electrical effects in nanoscale materials.

description.zh: 利用單元介紹的方式，將生物化學、微生物學、分子生物學、基因工程等原理，應用在微生物或蛋白質品種改良上，並介紹生物活性物質，如氨基酸、抗生素、免疫體、酵素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、抗體等之製造方法。

description.zh: 冶煉技術係介紹金屬提煉方法之原理與技術。內容包括火法冶煉,濕法冶煉及電化冶煉。火法冶煉包括熔煉,精煉及蒸餾水之化學原理。濕法冶煉包括浸出,固液分離,淨液及金屬採取等。電化冶煉包括電解精煉,電解採取及熔融鹽電解等之原理與方法。
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental principles and techniques of metals production. It consists of pyrometallurgy. hydrometallurgy and electrometallurgy. In pyometallurgy, chemical principles of smelting. Refining and distillation are discussed; in hydrometallurgy, leaching. precipitation  purification and metals recovery are described; in electrometallurgy. basics of electrochemistry, electrolytic refining. Electrolytic winning and electrolyzed in molten bath are introduced.

This class is intended not only as a class for engineering students and students in cell biology, biotechnology, and medical courses at advanced graduate level, but also as a reference tool for research and clinical laboratories. I believe the students can have the knowledge of tissue engineering after the class finished. The topics of this course include the tissue of bio-materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor tissue, composite materials in biomedical engineerings.

name.en: Interactive Behavior between Soil and Structure

description.zh: 土壤與結構物之間的界面有應力的存在，該應力的大小與土壤及結構物的力學性質有關，也與結構物的變形有關.列如:地下室開控過程中，擋土結構物的變形，擋土牆的變位,基樁的變位等等。
description.en: The stress between soil and structure depends on the mechanical properties of soil and structure,and also influence the deformation of structure. Such as the excavation of basements and piles etc...

name.en: Special Topics on Urban Disaster Prevention

description.zh: 介紹國內外"都市防災基本計畫"之沿革，內容；探討都市防災之規劃，設計；都市更新（災後重建）中防災的課題；防災生活圈與防災據點之設立原則。
description.en: Introduce the "Urban precaution basis plan"of Taiwan and other countries; Study the subjects regarding to city renewing or reduiding after the caution;discuss the principles to set up the living zones and preecaution bases for urban disaster prevention.

description.zh: 基礎施工過程中，常常容易造成災害的問題，為了預測土壤與結構物互制行為，以作為災害的預防之用，數值分析常被用來作為實務的預測。而數值分析的正確性又控制在土壤的應力應變強度關係(組合律)及變形的定義。本課程的內容係針對土壤的組合律(包含線性及非線性)作完整的介紹，以補全數值分析所欠缺的力學性質。
description.en: Numerical analysis has been used extensively to predict the behaviour of soil-structure interaction problem.The correctness of soil constitutive law .This course will introduce the properties of stress-strain-strength.how to predict the soil engineering behaviour.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Planning and Risk Management

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

description.zh: 1.混凝土之力學行為 2.鋼筋混凝土構件之力學行為含彎短,剪力,軸力,扭矩及共同作用時之行為.桁架理論,版之降優線理論. 3.規範之說明,應用與比較.
description.en: Studies of actual member behavior;members in flexure,combined flexure,shear,and torsion;bond and anchorage;combined axial load and flexure;slender columns;deep beams;derivation of current code provisions.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 結合工作衡量之基礎及人事管理之應用，並使用工業工程之基本管理知識，使學生瞭解績效管理之概念、程序、方法及步驟，達成最終提昇工作績效之目地。
description.en: Combining the work measurement and personnel management applications to make the students realize the concept、procedure、methods of performance management. To improve performance of work is the target of this course.

description.zh: 1.策略管理者的特徵責任及風格 2.企業環境的偵察 3.策略形成 4.策略執行與評估 5.資訊科技與管理，高科技公司與多國籍企業的策略管理
description.en: This course attempts to define and analyze many the issue and function involved in management. The objection is to provide a set of frameworks for the development and analysis of strategic planning. The course seeks to structure the key dimension and the process of the strategic planning.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department. Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included

description.zh: 探討產品機能和成本配合的關係，綜合企業內所有知識和技能，做有系統、有組織的設計、材料種類、與型態改善，以達成降低成本，提高製程功能和品質。
description.en: Value Management (VM) is an organized, systematic approach to obtaining optimal value for every industry. The learning and training topics are: the system approach, opportunities, application and methodology for value management. Also, involve managing project value through lift cycle costing, problem solving and project value and case studies.

description.zh: 本課程採專題方式上課，主要討論網路上目前行銷的相關問題。讓學生能充分掌握如何利用網路有效達成企業行銷的目的;以開拓電子商務的蓬勃商機。
description.en: This seminar course discusses about the related topics on internet advertizing in order to know how to advertize on the internet efficiently.

description.zh: 透過講課、討論、專題報告的方式，瞭解投資的擬定、報酬與風險分析、執行與評估方法，並探討不同因素對投資之影響，期提供良好的投資決策。
description.en: The objective of this course lies in definition of investment, return and risk analysis, investment execution and evaluation methods. Various factors that affect the investment decision problems are discussed to help decision-maker properly resolves investment decision-making.

description.zh: 本課程內容共分零售基本概念、零售規劃技巧、零售機構之管理、零售之行銷組合及零售之應用與未來趨勢等五篇。第一篇「零售基本概念」，介紹零售的本質，描述零售機構的型態及台灣零售業之發展與未來趨勢。第二篇「零售規劃技巧」，說明如何訂定零售策略及進行零售研究，闡述商圈規劃與分析，並且探討零售地點選擇的決策流程與評估技術。第三篇「零售機構之管理」，先敘述零售組織規劃，然後討論零售業人力資料管理的程序及重點，也論及零售機構財務規劃、分析及預算制度。第四篇「零售行銷組合」，以行銷組合（產品、訂價、通路及促銷）之概念，分別討論店面設計與商品展示、商品採購與管理，零售訂價技巧及步驟，零售促銷規劃與活動。第五篇「零售之應用與未來趨勢」，將零售管理之學理及概念應用於更廣泛之場合，包括直接銷售（Direct Selling）及綠色零售（Green Retailing），最後針對零售管理之未來趨勢探討科技應用在零售管理，網路行銷及虛擬商店。
description.en: There are five sections in this course. The first section will introduce the basic concepts of retailing which the fundamental concepts, the models of organization and the future. The second section, the skills of retailing planning, the strategy and research are discussed. The analyses of business circle and store location are decided by several different technologies. The third section-the way of establishing organization and managing the human resources, the financial planning, and budgeting are included. The fourth section；the combination of marketing, the concept of 4P（product, price, path and promotion）, the shop design and product demonstration, produce purchasing and managing, the decision of price and the activities of promotion are included. The fifth section；the future implementation of retailing, the direct selling and green retailing are included. The use of high-tech in retailing and internet marketing and virtual store are discussed in this section.

description.zh: 本課程包含ERP系統演進，全球運籌管理，ERP系統軟硬體結構，及企業管理智慧系統。
description.en: This course includes: ERP development history, global logistic strategy, ERP software and hardware infrastructures, and enterprise management intelligence system.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在研習機器學習的基本概念、執行演算法、應用方法與其在工程與管理上之應用，課程內容包括:1. 機器學習基本概念與應用;2.機器學習演算法概論3.歸納學習演算法4.決策樹演算法5.案例式學習演算法6.專家系統建立7.機器學習應用方法8.機器學習論文導讀9.機器學習專題製作
description.en: The Machine Learning course is to introduce and study the machine learning concepts, algorithms, application methodologies and its applications on engineering and management. The course encompasses the following topics.1. Machine learning concepts and applications.2. Machine learning algorithms. 3. Inductive learning algorithms. 4. Decision tree algorithms. 5. Case-based learning algorithms. 6. Construction of expert systems. 7. Applications of machine learning. 8. Paper readings on machine learning. 9. Projects on machine learning.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解行銷通路之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路與行銷管理的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程，通路結構，通路行為，通路溝通，通路策略及通路續效評估等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in marketing channel. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making channel decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations, and a term paper.

description.zh: 隨著自動化科技與資訊技術的日益精進，產業生產活動必須結合這些相關技術，朝向自動化及電子化目標以改善企業體質，提升企業競爭力。本課程之主要目標便是教導學生關於生產自動化及企業電子化之相關知識以及進行製商整合時所需之觀念及技術。
description.en: The manufacturing system becomes more complex due to the more competitive situation occurring in the marketplace. In order to survive，the enterprise must combine the automation technology and information technology to improve the manufacturing activities for fulfilling the need of production. Therefore ,  the aim of this course is to teach the concept and technology for manufacturing automation and electronic business.

name.zh: 電腦整合製造系統之設計與分析
name.en: Design and Analysis of a Computer Integrated Manufacturing S

description.zh: 本課程主要內容在介紹產品在製造期間就整個製造過程，裝配組合，物料搬運以及品管檢驗等生產活動相關的實體活動利用電腦的控制來整合其執行工件
description.en: This course is to provide students with the concept，design and analysis of a Computer－integrated manufacturing system。 Its content covers manufacturing operations，assembly/joining material handling process and test/inspection。

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討模擬學基本理論如模式化方法資料分析、分配之選定及判別、模擬進行、及結果分析。此外，相關文獻及運用領域將深入探討。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the fundamental of simulation,such as modeling approch, data analysis, selection and testing of distribution,simulations,and output analysis. Besides, the related literature reviews and applications areas will be focused.

description.zh: 物流有隱含供應鏈的觀念，物流管理係從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，整個配銷通路管理的整合性哲學。內容有物流構面、供應鏈、存貨決定、倉儲管理、運輸管理、訂單處理、資訊系統、全球物流等。
description.en: Logistics implies supply chain concept. Logistics management is an integrated philosophy to manage the total flow of distribution channel from supplier to ultimate customer. The course includes dimension of logistics, supply chain, inventory decision systems, global logistics.  through manufacturing systems design.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。工程最佳化方法導論、線性規劃法、非線性規劃法、多目標函數最佳化、近代數學規劃法介紹、精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods, Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization, Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Techniques, and Optimum Design of Precision Machine Components and Systems.

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解車輛省油不單純只是引擎燃燒性能或機構的改良而已，且另一個對車輛省油有重要貢獻的手段便是車輛的傳動系統技術的改良，此先進改良的方式增加學生對傳動系統重要性的認識。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of power train system, the relationship between engine and power train system, and the mechanical design of power train system. The purpose of this study is to increase the students' understanding in power train system.

description.zh: 介紹振動模態分析的理論、實驗方法、感測器及儀器選用、量測信號的處理以及機械監測及診斷。
description.en: Topics include Theory of modal analysis, Experimental modal test, Transducers and instruments, Signal processing, Machine condition monitoring and diagnosis.

description.zh: 引擎及主要控制系統介紹，引擎動力系統之數學模式（含進氣系統、油路系統、點火系統、廢氣排放系統），閉迴路空燃比控制，爆震控制，引擎怠速之控制，引擎等速之控制，引擎加速／減速調整。
description.en: Introduction of Engine and Main Control System, Mathematical Model of Engine Dynamic System (Including Inlet System, Oil-Loop System, Ignition System, Exhaust System), Closed-Loop Air-Fuel Ratio Control, Detonation Control, Engine Idle Speed Control, Engine Cruising Speed Control, Engine Acceleration/Deceleration Regulation.

name.en: Special Topics on Internal Combustion Engines

description.zh: 進、排氣系統與空氣動力學，排放物與燃燒現象，循環模擬與分析，引擎性能調諧及控制，引擎噪音源與控制。
description.en: Gas Dynamics in Intake and Exhaust Manifold, Emissions and Related Combustion Phenomena, Cycle-Simulation and Analysis, Engine Performance Tuning and Control, Engine Noise Source and Its Control.

description.zh: 課程包含模糊控制與灰色系統，培養學生能運用模糊控制與灰色系統之理論於控制系統及車輛系統上，內容包括模糊集合，近似推理理論，解模糊方法，模糊控制器之設計，模糊控制器之應用，.灰色系統，灰預測原理，灰色建模，灰色控制。
description.en: Fuzzy control and grey system are introduced in this course.  Then students can apply these theories to control systems and vehicle control.  Contents are fuzzy sets, inference, design of fuzzy controller, application, gray system, gray prediction, gray modeling, and gray control.

name.en: Electrical and Mechanical Systems of Railway Transit Systems

description.zh: 1.供電系統、2.電力系統之控制機制、3.牽引系統之主要回路、4.車速控制系統、5.煞車控制系統、6.運行理論、7.列車行控技術、8.其他機電工程
description.en: This course helps students to learn about the operating strategies and energy converting technologies in railway transit systems. Here, the following topics are contented in this course.1.Power Supply System.  2.Control Mechanism of Power System.  3.Main Circuits of Traction System.  4.Speed Control System.  5.Braking Control and Energy Conversion.  6.Train Operation Theorem.  7.Vehicle Driving Control/Technology  8.Other concerning topics as energy conversion strategies etc. will also be introduced in this courses.

description.zh: 冷凍設計、庫體設計、保溫與防漏設計、熱負荷計算、溫濕度控制、除霜設計與控制、氣流設計、性能分析
description.en: Refrigeration design, structure design, insulation and vapor barrier design, heat load calculation, temperature and humidity control, defrost design and control, airflow design, performance analysis

description.zh: 先修課程︰熱傳學本課程主要針對冷凍系統隔熱與熱傳技術作更深入探討，學生以修習過大學部" 熱傳學" 三學分之課程，本課程主要闡述︰1. 熱傳導理論2. 隔熱材料性質3. 真空保溫技術4. 真空保溫材料性質5. 冷凍系統隔熱設計
description.en: The main objective of this course is to offer a postgraduate level of the knowledge of insulation technology for a refrigeration system.The course includes the following subjects:1. Theory of heat conduction 2. The property of insulation materials3. Outline of vacuum insulation technology  4. The property of vacuum insulation materials5. Design of insulation for refrigeration systems.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制2. 區域型電力能管理策略3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程主要包含四部份，分別為基本有限差分法、流體力學與熱傳方程式的有限差分法應用、有限體積法、格點產生法。
description.en: This course comprises four parts. Part one is fundamentals of finite-difference methods. Part 2 is the application of finite-difference methods to the equations of fluid mechanics and heat transfer. Part 3 is finite-volume method. Part 4 is grid generation.

description.zh: 從闡述各種汽車共生系統在特定的工業製程，商業智慧型大樓或大學校園區域網路型式等能源有效利用的整合規劃設計，主要課程內容為： 1.汽車共生系統概念 2.熱力循環的技術理論 3.多元化的原動機利用 4.複合循環發電廠 5.都會型汽電共生利用 6.汽電共生的能源管理 7.汽電共生的環境管理 8.各種熱電轉換裝置 9.高級能源轉換科技之汽電共生
description.en: By studying this course, the following terms can be identified, defined, used: 1.The Concept of Cogeneration system 2.Theory of Cogeneration Technology. 3.Combined cycles plant. 4.Heating and cooling integration with power generation. 5.The Design Concept and Demonstrated economic performance of cogen. sys. 6.Social and Environmental management of cogen. sys. 7.Conversion Method and Technology on advanced system.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一)儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二)儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

description.zh: 污染源分析，室內空氣品質標準，濃度平衡之計算法，空氣之過濾原理與設計，建築通風法規，生物潔淨室標準，化學過濾應用，ASHRAE 62標準之探討
description.en: Pollution source analysis, indoor air quality standards, balance of concentration, air filtration theories and designs, building ventilation standards, bio-clean room standards, chemical filtration, discussion on ASHRAE standard 62.

description.zh: 空調中央監控系統之規劃設計。課程內容含設備運轉之操作管理，配合電力尖峰負載控制節電管理，能源有效利用控制，溫度、濕度、環境因子之監測及操控，故障監測維修控制等，並介紹空調系統運轉最佳化之方法。
description.en: This course is focused on the design and planning of central monitoring system for HVAC controls. The contents are the operating management of equipment, effective energy usage, temperature/humidity/environmental factors monitoring and control. The optimal methods applied in the operation of HVAC are also included.

description.zh: 低溫冷凍科學在高附加價值的生物科技與生物醫學具有不可言喻的重要性，低溫生物醫學技術在於藉由熱流科學的理論、方法和技術，探討低溫生物醫學的一些結構性問題、低溫生物醫學的熱分析、熱計算和熱試驗、最佳化熱控制方法、研製和改善低溫生物醫學中的儀器設備。本課程內容包含七個單元：（一）低溫生物醫學技術導論、（二）溶液的凍結特性與細胞的損傷、（三）水溶液的結晶與玻璃化、（四）生物體低溫保存技術與應用、（五）低溫技術在電子顯微鏡生物樣品製備中的應用、（六）低溫生物醫學技術的儀器和設備、（七）低溫外科工程。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to introduce the effects of low temperatures on all types of organisms and their constituent cells, tissues and organs. The contents include the range from natural mechanisms of cold tolerance, cryopreservation of cells for medical purpose, low temperature microscopy, cryosurgery, through to the physics and physical chemistry of water and ice, and heat and mass transfer in biological systems.

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

name.en: Seminar of Services Marketing and Management

description.zh: 本課程主要研討服務行銷與管理，內容包括：（1）服務分類（2）服務接觸（3）服務品質（4）服務環境（5）服務失誤（6）服務補救（7）服務策略（8）顧客滿意（9）顧客價值管理（10）服務定價。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of services marketing and management. The contents will include following topics：（1）classification of services, （2）the service encounter, （3）service quality,（4）servicescape, （5）service failure, （6）service recovery, （7）service strategies, （8）customer satisfaction, （9）customer value management,（10）service pricing.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生數種常見的網路模式理論及其在物流業的運用。以數學規劃和圖網理論的解題方式都將加以教授。本課程所探討的物流網路模式為（1）最短路經與最小延伸樹，（2）旅行者問題（環節覆蓋問題），（3）中國郵差問題（路徑覆蓋問題），（4）車輛繞行問題，（5）中位問題，（6）中央問題，（7）工廠位置問題，以及（8）群組涵蓋問題。
description.en: This course teaches the students theoretical background on some popular network models with applications in transportation industry. Both approaches based on mathematical programming and graph theory will be discussed. Models to be investigated are: (1) Shortest Distance and Minimum Spanning Tree, (2) Traveling Salesman Problem (Node Covering Problem), (3) Chinese Postman's Problem (Edge Covering Problem), (4) Vehicle Routing Problem, (5) Median Problem, (6) Central Problem. (7) Plant Location Problem, and (8) Set Covering Problem.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對流通業中各項經營管理項目作探討，其中包含設施位置選定，人力資源，流通規劃，及銷售促進等。此外，商用地理資訊系統之應用及個案研討亦包含在此課程中。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the required management issues of retail business，such as location selection，human resource ，retail planning ，and marketing etc。Besides，at also includes business GIS and case study。

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討企業系統模擬中之各類基本理論如模式化方法資料庫分析、分配之選定與判別、模擬進行、及結果分析。此外，相關文獻及運用領域將深入探討。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the fundamental of corporation system simulation such as modeling approach , data analysis selection and testing of distribution , simulation , and output analysis. Besides, the related literature reviews and applications areas will be focused.

description.zh: 本課程包含資料庫行銷之基本內容及未來發展，聯合資料庫，供應目標對象，可預測模組及決策支援等。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of database marketing and its future development, consolidated database, offer targetting, predictive modeling and decision support.

description.zh: 本課程先以供應鏈之基礎理論為主題，之後輔以國內外製造業及流通業之供應鏈管理作案例討論。
description.en: This course firstly focuses on the fundamental theory of supply chain management. The case study on manufacturing industrial and retailing business will be also included.

name.zh: 組織學習與行銷知識管理
name.en: Organizational Learning and Marketing Knowlege Management

description.zh: 本課程以理論為出發點，分析組織學習在行銷管理中資訊處理與知識管理的角色，課程主題包括,組織學習，組織創新，市場導向理論, 顧客價值管理理論,知識管理概論,行銷知識創造與轉移知識管理個案,知識管理與資訊技術。
description.en: This course will analysis how organizational learning impacts on the marketing information process and knowledge management. It will include the followings: organizational learning, innovation, market-orientation, and customer value management, marketing knowledge management.

description.zh: 多變量分析及處理二項以上變項的統計，分析技術、常用于管理，經濟，財務，會計等之分析‧課程內容：因素分析、主成份分析、複迴歸分析、區別分析、多變項異數分析典型相關分析、集群分析、聯合分析、直線方程式模式
description.en: Multivariate analysis is to analyze more then two variables simultaneously, and to be able to apply to management, economics, accounting…etc.The contents of the course:factor analysis, principal component analysis, multiple regression analysis, multiple discriminate analysis, multiple analysis of variance, canonical correlation analysis, cluster analysis, conjoint analysis, SEM…etc.

description.zh: 介紹資訊整合與交換的概念。藉由作業程序的改造及資訊技術與標準的運用，將業務上所必要的資訊電子化，標準化，以建立全球共通商業系統的無紙作業環境
description.en: Introduce the idea of information integration and exchange for the commercial environment. Also, by applying the business procedure re-engineering and information technology to establish necessary standard for paperless commercial environment.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討各種高分子之聚合方法及動力學之研究，如逐步聚合、遊離基連鎖聚合、乳化聚合、離子連鎖聚合、連鎖共聚合反應、開環聚合、立體規則高分子之合成，未終止的游離基聚合方法。從分子量的分佈，結構物性之關係，作高分子聚合之最佳化設計，並且探討這些聚合方法如何應用在最新的科技上，如光電材料、複合材料。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the polymer synthesis and Kinetics studies. The synthesis includes step polymerization, free radical chain polymerization, emulsion polymerization, ionic chain polymerization, chain copolymerization, ring opening polymerization, sterospecific polymerization and living free radical polymerization. The synthesis scheme is optimized with the structure-properties relationship and molecular design. The potential application of these methods in high-tech materials, such as optoelectronics, and composites, will be elucidated.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子?電路成像高分子?光電子成像材料?最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

name.en: A Briefing on Architecture Design Course (II)

description.zh: 總課程目標：     在學員原有專業基礎上，增加其深度與廣度，包含自實質與非      實質環境之探討與實踐等之能力。 研二課程目標：     透過設計課題培養自實質至非實質環境與實踐之總體操作能力      ，其深度與廣度將是評價判準。 課程概要：     就各學員所選定課題完成一設計成果及完整探討與實踐之過程      書面資料，以接受目標檢驗。
description.en: Goal for the Course :    Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn   to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and   practice in both substantial and non-substantial   environments. 2nd Grade Through different design topics, the disciples   accomplish the course goal－enhancing the ability of   general manipulation and practice in both substantial and   non-substantial environments. A complete presentation,   which includes design result and a report of the process   of ascertainment, will be required for evaluation. The   evaluation will emphasize on the depth and width of   ascertainment and practice.

description.zh: 本課程區分為四個實習，共一學年之都市設計實習，每學期應從事幾項實習，依該學期之情況而定：(一)大型基地開發之建築規劃與都市設計實習：參照台北市都市發展局擬定之「都市設計與土地使用開發許可」之審議標準，練習建築、敷地與都市設計三者整合關係之設計實習。(二)都市更新地區都市設計實習：以台北市更新地區為範例，選定基地範圍從事都市更新地區之改造，建立地區未來像，並擬定都市設計準則。(三)都市計畫通盤檢討地區都市設計實習：依據都市計畫通盤檢討第八條規定，都市計畫通盤檢討地區必須依據該地區之交通、產業、文化、生態及基地等因素，擬定都市設計準則；以台北市都市計畫通盤檢討為例，練習都市設計準則之訂定，或以都市計畫細部計畫為例，研擬土地使用分區管制與設計準則。(四)新發展區都市設計實習：選定一個地區，可能是擴大都市發展地區或新市鎮、新社區之規劃設計實習。
description.en: There are four exercises for one academic year. The exercises to be undertaken  depend on when and how it is appropriate:(4)	Exercise on building planning and urban design for large-scale land development project(5)	Exercise practice on urban design for district renewal planning(6)	Exercise of overall review district urban design out of the total urban design	(4)	Exercise on urban design for new development area

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Planning

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態規劃理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套規劃操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。 1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態規劃理論的應用 a. 都市地區和鄉村地區 b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and planning in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Planning" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows; 1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology 2. Ecological planning theory 3. The application of ecological theory in landscape practice a. Urban region and countryside b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

name.en: The Monograph on Cultural Heritage Conservation

description.zh: 為強化建築專業領域對文化資產與歷史保存之概念與實務推展，本課程將以台灣相關歷史保存議題作為探討之主軸。1.現行文化資產保存法之現況與問題（一）2.現行文化資產保存法之現況與問題（二）3.都市計畫與歷史保存4.台灣歷史保存運動5.歷史保存個案討論（一）6.歷史保存個案討論（二）7.都市保存與地方再發展策略8.社區、民間組織與歷史保存9.私有古蹟與發展權移轉10.921 震災後的文化資產保存工作11.日韓等國文化資產保存法令比較12.考古遺址保存13.歷史保存與文化論述的建構14.傳統匠師與古蹟修復制度之建立
description.en: Course Structure and Content:1.	Philosophy and Politics of Conservation 2.	Conservation Law and Practice 3.	Conservation Economics 4.	Comparative Cultural Policy 5.	Case Studies 6.	Urban Conservation and Redevelopment7.	Civic Organization in Conservation8.	On Archaeological Relics9.	Historic Conservation and Cultural DiscoursePrivate Properties in Conservation

description.zh: 本課程主要為討論台灣地區建築上的風土特色，以及本地各歷史階段之建築回應此特質所提供的建築成就或特色。
description.en: This course explores the vernacular character of Taiwanese architecture and architectural achievement and characteristics in response to the character during respective historical periods.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

name.en: An Advanced study on green Building

description.zh: 一、教學目標：1.	學習且體認國內外綠建築、環境共生建築及永續經營建築之課題與本質。研討國內外對其課題之解決方法，並培養研擬課題與本土化規劃設計方法之能力。二、教學內容：1.	綠建築、環境共生建築、永續建築之內涵。2.	研討地球環境、人類生活環境及建築環境之相互關係。3.	研討環境共生與綠建築之本質。4.	研討綠建築與生命週期各階段之環境課題。5.	研討國內外綠建築規劃、設計技術及解決方法。6.	研討綠社區、綠都市之發展規劃。
description.en: 1.	The contect of Green Building, Symbiosis Building and Sustainable Building.2.	Study of relation between globe environment, hurman life environment and architecture environment.3.	The nature of  Green Building and Symbiosis Building.4.	The discussion of Green Building and Life Cycle.5.	The technology and method of Green Building Planning.6.	The Planning of Green Community and Green City.

description.zh: 授課內容主要在介紹從事都市計畫或都市設計經常習用有關都市方面的資料蒐集、調查以及分析的各種方法，重點涵蓋都市空間理論、人口、產業、交通成長理論及相關的資料調查技術。所使用的分析方法包括統計分析、模式運用、地理資訊系統及試算表分析等，並以實例介紹有關都市人口、產業活動、交通運輸量的分析及預測，使學生能將學習的理論與與實務相結合，增進都市分析的專業能力。
description.en: The course focus is on the training of urban analysis methods to urban planning and design professions. The theories about urban spatial planning, population forecasting, economic development, and transportation analysis are introduced. Emphasis is laid on the methods of data collection and investigation techniques, geographic information system operation, statistics analysis, and spreadsheet utilization. Students are required to complete some related applications to improve both their academic abilities and professional capabilities.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在研究目前環境議題與強化有關環境規劃設計的理論與經驗，以及增進對環境整體規劃與設計可能途徑的瞭解。故本課程主要內容包括：一、緒論 二、環境決策 三、環境保護政策 四、永續發展 五、達到良好環境規劃與設計的可能途徑 六、環境規劃與設計的專業實務練習 七、結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the nature of current environmental issues, and further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with the various approaches to environmental planning and design. Our hope is to improve planning and design practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1.Introduction 2.Environmental decision-making 3.Environmental protection policy 4.Sustainable development 5.Alternative approaches to environmental planning and design. 6.Professional practice of environmental planning and design 7.Conclusions

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   1.多模光纖實驗 2.單模光纖實驗 3.位置量測實驗 4.Doppler測速實驗 5.全像術 6.全像干涉術 7.疊紋術 8.疊紋干涉術 9.電腦輔助雷射切割程式製作 10.雷射切割實驗 11.快速原型三D加工NC程式製作 12.雷射輔助快速原型製造 13.基本光電週邊實習 13-1.光資訊輸入：數位相機、掃瞄器、影像捕抓 13-2.光資訊輸出 14.光資訊儲存實習 14-1.MO的用法與控制 14-2.CD/RW的用法與控制 15.基本光資訊處理實習 15-1.光計算圖形辨認實習 15-2.MRI醫學影像處理

Usage and control of CD/RW 15.Dasic optical information processing  15-1.Optical compating and pattern recognition  15-2.MRI medical image processing

description.zh: 先修課程：電磁學、工程數學、近代物理。   由電磁學之理論推展光波之運行，並經由近代物理之量子論推導出之原子及分子能階與固態晶體之能帶理論，加以說明電磁波與物質間之作用。介紹共振腔、活化性介質及各種雷射之激發形式等雷射三個基本組成。並針對雷射光之種類、特性及其應用，加以說明。
description.en: Combining the propagation of optical wave been deduced from the electromagnetic theory and the quantum theory introduced by modern physics such as energy level of atom and molecular and the energy band of solid state, the interaction between electromagnetic wave and matter is introduced. The three fundamental components of laser: resonator, active medium, and pumping method are explained. Also the types, characteristics, and applications of various laser are introduced.

description.zh: 先修課程：近代物理。 1.晶體結構與生長 2.晶格振動與聲子   3.能帶理論 4.光電材料基本特性 5.接面理論 6.發光元件   7.檢光元件 8.電荷耦合元件（CCD）   9.液晶顯示（LCD）
description.en: 1.Crystal structures and growth 2.Lattice vibration and phonon 3.Energy-band theory 4.Basic properties of photonic methods 5.Junction theory 6.Light-emitting devices   7.Pgotodetectors 8.Changed-coupled devices   9.Liguid crystal display

name.en: Techniques and Applications of Films Analysis

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   表面現象、膜層厚度、介面反應等與近代高科技技術，如鍍膜工程、表面處理、腐蝕、磨潤、微機電、感測器、光電半導體技術等息息相關，且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究，它包括振動、電子或離子頻譜分析、微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含：表面形貌觀察(SEM、BSEM、AFM)、成份分析(光譜分析、質譜分析、EDX)、結構分析(XRD、AES、ESCA、XPS)、鍵結分析(Raman光譜、FTIR),光電性質、表面粗糙度、膜厚、附著力、內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena, films thickness and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and optical semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includes optical-electrical properties SEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   本課程介紹各種應用於非破壞檢測、生產線上即時檢測、及影像識別之光電技術。其內容包含：全像術在非破壞檢測上之應用、斑點干涉術在非破壞檢測上之應用、雷射線上量測技術、光纖線上量測技術、X-ray 在非破壞檢測上之應用、影像處理、影像識別。
description.en: This course introduces the opto-electronic methods applied on nondestructive testing, real-time inspection, and image recognition. Which involves: non-destructive testing by using holographic interferometry, non-destructive testing by using speckle interferometry, non-destructive testing by using X-ray, real-time inspection by using laser beam, real-time inspection by using optical fiber sensor, image processing, image recognition.

description.en: The purpose of the course is to provide student of fundamental concepts, techniques and applications of otics in a Opto-Electronic integrated system.It may include the theories of geometric options, the propagation of laser beam,the difraction and interference of light,the characteristis of coherence and polarization, the effents of the Electro-Optic, Magneto-optic modulation,the optical properties of waveguide and optic-fibre,and the applications of optical fibre sensor.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程包括理論與實務，由製科所教授共同開課。第二學期探討的範圍包含製造設備、量測與檢測，側重在與製造業相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course includes theories and experiments, is conducted by several professors of institute of manufacturing technology. In second semester, topics covered are mainly in the field of manufacturing equipment, measuring and inspection, emphasizing in professional knowledge of manufacturing industry.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹電腦輔助設計及電腦輔助製造的系統及方法。包括：三D工件建圖、設計計算及分析、製造實驗及分析、軟體寫作、網路、NC程式寫作、製程模擬、智慧型製程控制及優化、電腦整合製造系統。
description.en: Introducing the system and methods about computer aided design and manufacturing. Topics covered including: three dimensional parts modeling, calculation and analysis during design process, manufacturing experiment and analysis, software programming, communication network, simulation of manufacturing process, motion control, intelligent manufacturing process control and optimization, computer integrated manufacturing system.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機械設計原理、機密機械特有設計考慮、機械結構件之靜態、動態、與熱傳分析。機械次系統單元如主軸單元、動力驅動、進給驅動、與控制系統等之設計與分析。機械之精度與效能分析。工具機之實務設計與分析個案研究。
description.en: Principles of machine design. Special design considerations in precision machinery. Static dynamic, and thermal analysis of structural members of machine. Analysis of sub-unit of machine like spindle unit, power drive unit, feed drive unit, and control system, etc. Accuracy and performance evaluation of machine, Case study with special emphasis on machine tool.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Structural Dynamic Testing

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意信號與系統分析，相關性與頻譜密度函數，單輸入/輸出關係，系統辨識與響應，傳遞路徑辨識，多輸入/輸出關係，動態信號分析，實驗技術，結構動態測試，電腦輔助分析，環境動態測試。
description.en: Signal and .System Analysis, Correlation and Spectral Density Function, Signal Input /Output Relationship, system Identification and Response, Propagation Path Identification, Multiple Input / Output Relationship, Dynamic Signal Analysis, Experimental Techniques, Structural Dynamic Testing, Computer Aided Analysis, Environmental Test for Dynamics

description.zh: 快速原型加工原理、快速原型系統分類、加工參數與加工結果分析，製程設備研究，快速模具技術研究，快速原型與快速模具實習，專題研究與討論。
description.en: Principle of rapid prototyping, Classification of rapid prototyping systems, Analysis of manufacturing parameters and working results, Study of manufacturing equipments, Study of rapid tooling, Practice of rapid prototyping and rapid tooling, Special projects and discussion.

description.zh: 介紹非傳統加工方法及加工相關的自動化與控制技術，包括：製程控制，數值控制，幾何資料處理，進給驅動器，NC機器的位置量測系統，自動化加工的機器監視與診斷，電腦整合製造。
description.en: Introduce the nontraditional manufacturing methods and related automation and control technology, including: process control, numerical control, geometric data processing, driving systems, NC machine position measurement system, automatic manufacturing monitoring and diagnostics, computer integrated manufacturing.

name.zh: 精密機械精度分析與控制
name.en: Analysis and control of Accuracy for precision Machinery

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械，機械安裝，精密機構，機構運動特性，力、流與熱影響，機械力與變形控制，電機運動控制，流體動力控制，環境相關事項。
description.en: Precision machinery, Machine installations, Precision mechanism, Movement properties of mechanism, Force, fluid and heat effects of structure, Mechanical control, Electrical control, Fluidic power control, Environmental issues。

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

description.zh: 具有好的設計構想並不容易，因為它真的挑戰是靠實際地去執行它的創新策略及內涵。而設計創新專案面臨日趨專業及複雜化之趨勢，相對地優質的產品創新已不容許次級產品的存在空間。設計管理者必須運用前瞻具差異的眼光主動發展並整合專案內外多元專業之資源，並以品牌行銷的策略為前導，規劃並有效地管理專案。本課程重點：1.	以品牌行銷為導向之創新管理的架構與多元專業之定位。2.	有關知識與技巧之準則。3.	創新專案之規劃、組織、推行與監督。
description.en: Having good product ideas is not easy, but the real challenge is lies in carrying out ideas through a practical product innovation strategy and its embodiment. Problems within design innovation is increasingly facing the state of more complexity and professions, successful design may effectively preserve to have differentiated marketing and design vision organizing capable multidisciplinary teams both inner and outside of cooperate resource.This course may focus on:1.The framework for innovation.2.The model establishment of brand and experimental marketing orientated innovation management with regard to the placement of multidisciplinary team.3.Criteria development for both related knowledge and skills.4.Planning, organizing, implementing, monitoring and evaluating design innovation.5.The need for adoptability in organization.

description.zh: 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動,研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course provides study of ergonomical design related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. With emphasis on technology integration, ergonomics proactive and methodology, the course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 因應國際分工、快速研發的需求，本課程以研究設計團隊如何有效地運用同步及非同步溝通技術，執行設計專案，並探討遠距設計的問題、可行的設計模式，以及培養電腦仲介與管理的技能。
description.en: This course is designed to study how to effectively employ both synchronous and asynchronous communication technologies to carry out a project designing at a distance in order to shorten cycle times. It is also to investigate the problems with the communication media and potential of this way of working. Finally the course provides the discipline of computer mediation and management for distributed groups.

description.zh: 程式語言為計算機軟體之基礎，本課程主要探討程式語言之類型以及各種語言之設計原理與特色，經由對這些原理及特色之了解，程式設計師便可針對各類應用之特性選擇最合適之語言。本課程內容包括：1.程式語言之發展與分類，2.設計原理，3.語法與語意，4.資料型態，5.控制結構，6.正規語言，7.抽象資料型態，8.物件導向程式語言，9.函式語言，10.邏輯語言，11.平行處理語言。

Formal languages 7.Abstract data types 8. Object-oriented programming languages 9.Functional programming languages 9.Logic programming languages 10.Parallel processing languages

description.zh: 本課程探討應用物件導向方法從事軟體設計的過程與步驟, 透過課程專題製作,學者將學習以UML記載分析與設計之結果, 並使用一個物件導向語言(如Java或C++)實作之. 課程內容: 1. 物件導向模型 -- UML介紹 2. 物件導向程式語言與環境 3. 物件導向軟體發展週期 3.1 物件導向分析 - 需求分析, 使用個案, 觀念模型, 有限狀態模型  3.2 物件導向設計 - 實際使用個案, 合作圖, 類別圖,  設計模板,  3.3 程式撰寫 - 設計與程式之應對  4. 專題
description.en: This course familiarizes the students with the principles and techniques for object-oriented software development. The students will use UML and an object-oriented language such as Java or C++ to complete a term programming project. Course contents: 1. Object-oriented modeling with UML  2. Object-oriented languages and environments  3. description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

name.zh: 高分子材料與複合材料

description.zh: 授課內容包括高分子及複合材料的製程、結構及性質等綜合知識，首先介紹機械混練與接枝共聚合等基本製程方法，並探討交穿網狀高分子合膠材料，以及含浸顆粒狀、纖維狀、板狀等強化高分子複合材料的結構形態與工程性質之相關原理。
description.en: Synthesis, morphology and engineering behavior of polymer and composite materials. Mechanical blend alloys, block and graft copolymers, interpenetrating polymer networks, polymer impregnated particulate, fiber and sheet-reinforce polymeric composites are emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程將基本物理化學原理應用在材料科學上，探討電子組態、化學鍵及晶體結構間之關係。內容包括晶體結構、X 光繞射分析、相平衡、材料之光學及電學性質及材料表面之鑑定及分析。
description.en: This subject covers the basic principles of physical chemistry and shows how they apply in describing the behavior of the solid state. The relationship between electronic structure, chemical bonding and crystal surface is developed. Attention is also given to characterization of atomic and molecular arrangements in materials as well as quantum optical and electrical effects in nanoscale materials.

description.zh: 利用單元介紹的方式，將生物化學、微生物學、分子生物學、基因工程等原理，應用在微生物或蛋白質品種改良上，並介紹生物活性物質，如氨基酸、抗生素、免疫體、酵素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、抗體等之製造方法。
description.en: Biotechnology applications in mutant microbial and protein productions are to be introduced based on the knowledge of biochemistry, microbiology, molecular biology, and genetic engineering, etc. This course also introduces the productions of some living blocks, such as amino acids, antibodies, enzymes, hormone, proteins, lipids, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括Wavelet轉換、變分法及積分方程等工程分析之技術，且以Matlab軟體來應用至影像處理、噪音振動、最佳控制、偏微分方程等工程應用實例。.
description.en: Including Wavelet transform, Variation principle, and integral equation Engineering Analysis technology, try to use Matlab software apply to Image processing, denoise, optimal control, and solving partial differential equations.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

description.zh: 機械動態系統及表示法、變分原理(Variational Principles)、Lagrange方程式、Hamilton原理、系統分析、迴歸性判別法、判別法則及選定、控制應用。
description.en: Dynamical system representation and Modeling of Mechanical systems, Variational Principles Lagrange equation, Hamiltion Principles, System Analysis, System Identification and Application.

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意建立法律之基本概念與法律應用之知識，實務之科技企業經營與法律策略之整合。依據科技產業對法律知識需求之特性，概分三大類：(1)科技法律，包括智慧財產權，網際網路與電子商務法律，網路犯罪，智權契約與授權，企業智權管理等，(2)財經法律，包括國際經貿(WTO)爭端解決，國際投資與併購，證券交易，大陸投資等法律，(3)爭端解決機制：訴訟與偵查搜索程序，仲裁，調解，協商談判等
description.en: This course aims to make students realize basic law concept and common sense of law application, simultaneously to integrate between practical technology business management and law strategy.  According to need for technology industries in the respect of law, this course is divided into three parts: (1) Technology Law - including Intellectual Property Rights, Network and Electronic Business Law, Network Criminal, etc. (2)Financial Law - including laws  of WTO dispute resolution, international invest & acquire, stock trade, Investment in PROC, etc. (3) System of Dispute Resolution etc.

description.zh: 本課程係提供本系同學消防設備與法規方面之基礎，以為將來投身防火工程時之重要技能，其課程內容包含:消防與建築法規、滅火設備、警報設備、避難逃生設備、消防搶救上之必要設備等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover: code of building and fire-fighting、outfire facilities、warning  message facilities 、refuge facilities and fire-fighting santch facilities etc.

name.en: Special Topics on Performance Design for Evacuation

description.zh: 1.建築與安全2.防災計畫與內容3.避難計畫4.煙控計畫5.性能式避難安全設計6.實例研討

description.zh: 本課程係提供防火工程有關基礎概論、設計工學手法及實務技術等理論與應用兼重的課程，以促進學生自立研討學習能力，提高教學良性互動關係，可供職場工程實務相關防火工程之重要技能與知識。內容包括：一、現行防火安全法規與性能式防火法規二、性能式防火設計基礎概論三、防止起火及火災成長有關技術四、火災探測與滅火有關技術五、控制室內外延燒擴大有關技術六、避難疏散與逃生有關技術七、煙氣控制有關技術八、構造耐火設計有關技術
description.en: The purpose of course is to provide the fundamental theory and practical technique about the fire protection engineering, encourage the establishment of self-learning ability of students and facilitate their skill and knowledge about fire protection engineering in construction job. The course covers the following subjects:1.fire safety related regulation and performance-based code in force2.fundamental theory for performance-based design3.prevention techniques about fire initiation and growth4.techniques of fire detection and extinguishment5.control techniques about interior and exterior flame-spread6.means of evacuation and escape7.techniques of smoke control8.techniques about fire resistance design of structure

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。

description.en: This course is to provide students with the concept，design and analysis of a Computer－integrated manufacturing system。 Its content covers manufacturing operations，assembly/joining material handling process and test/inspection。

description.zh: 物流有隱含供應鏈的觀念，物流管理係從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，整個配銷通路管理的整合性哲學。內容有物流構面、供應鏈、存貨決定、倉儲管理、運輸管理、訂單處理、資訊系統、全球物流等。
description.en: Logistics implies supply chain concept. Logistics management is an integrated philosophy to manage the total flow of distribution channel from supplier to ultimate customer. The course includes dimension of logistics, supply chain, inventory decision systems, global logistics.  through manufacturing systems design.

description.zh: 本課程從車輛的發展史出發，介紹車輛從性能的追求、低公害污染、省能源化、輕量化和環保政策等，到當今世界能源石化燃料危機以及原物料的短缺所衍生的問題，使未來車輛的研究發展條件更趨嚴苛。本內容讓學生了解在未來的車輛發展變遷下其所應具備的基本知識。
description.en: This course introduces the history of the vehicle development. This course contains numerous subjects as follow: vehicle performance, low pollutants, energy economy, light weight, environmental policy, etc. Students will understand the basic knowledge of the future vehicle development.

name.en: Special Topics on Internal Combustion Engines

description.zh: 進、排氣系統與空氣動力學，排放物與燃燒現象，循環模擬與分析，引擎性能調諧及控制，引擎噪音源與控制。
description.en: Gas Dynamics in Intake and Exhaust Manifold, Emissions and Related Combustion Phenomena, Cycle-Simulation and Analysis, Engine Performance Tuning and Control, Engine Noise Source and Its Control.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論

description.zh: 冷凍設計、庫體設計、保溫與防漏設計、熱負荷計算、溫濕度控制、除霜設計與控制、氣流設計、性能分析
description.en: Refrigeration design, structure design, insulation and vapor barrier design, heat load calculation, temperature and humidity control, defrost design and control, airflow design, performance analysis

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 超低溫冷凍通常指進行在-100℃以下特定低溫範圍之冷凍技術應用，譬如高能能物理同步輻射冷卻，生物醫學胚胎冷凍保存，大型超低溫冷能氣化發電廠與中、長程飛彈推進系統冷卻技術等，現代微系統科技多方面高層次應用上之必要技術。故如何進行實質而有效整合超低溫系統技術，是決定未來國力競爭之主要關鍵項目。本課程主要內容將涵蓋：1. 多段多元化自動冷卻系統技術。2. .超低溫循環冷媒特性。3. 生物基因晶化冷凍技術應用。4. 系統裝置之材料選擇。5. 電子微觀系統應用。6. 超低溫冷卻劑之檢測與分析。
description.en: At the completion will have learned of this course:1. Multiple stage and cascade refrigeration systems technology.2. Refrigerant characteristics for low-temperature cycle.3. Biomedical applications of cryogenic refrigeration.4. Choice of low-temperature materials for refrigeration systems.5. Research applications of electron microscopy.6. Refrigerant properties of super low-temperature coolants.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一)儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二)儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

name.en: Non-eelctric Power Air Cond. Energy saving Tech.

description.zh: 非電力空調節能技術在與傳統利用機械壓縮式系統比較下，具有實質提供冷熱與電力的低成本、高效率之最佳經濟上特性。本課程內容將涵蓋： 1.吸收式系統技術 2.各式燃料電池﹝Fuel Cell﹞的連結應用技術 3.氫氣引擎的應用 4.MHD-磁動力流體發電技術 5.各種非電力空調技術評估 6.系統的最適化設計
description.en: The overall purpose of Non-electric Power Air Cond. Energy Saving Technology: 1.The Concept of Absorption Heat pump tech. 2.Fuel Cell System integration with Cogen. Sys. 3.Hydro-engine utilization tech. 4.Tech.of M.H.D. power generation. 5.Evaluation Tech for Non-electric Power Air Cond. Sys. 6.Optimize Design of Non -electric Power Air Cond. Sys.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming、network analysis、dynamic programming、game theory、(non)Integer linear programming、markov chains (markovian decision process)、queueing theory、inventory models、forecasting models、decision analysis and system simulation

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性.如何作好服務並使顧客滿意。內容:服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務業地點選擇、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、預測、服務業的經營策略、個案討論、論文討論
description.en: Service management is to discuss How to manage service and satisfy customers.The content of the course: Service concept 、The service delivery system 、Service facility and layout、Productivity and quality improvement、Forecasting、Service quality、Service strategy、Customer satisfaction、Case study、Paper  discuss

description.zh: 本課程先以供應鏈之基礎理論為主題，之後輔以國內外製造業及流通業之供應鏈管理作案例討論。
description.en: This course firstly focuses on the fundamental theory of supply chain management. The case study on manufacturing industrial and retailing business will be also included.

description.zh: 介紹資訊整合與交換的概念。藉由作業程序的改造及資訊技術與標準的運用，將業務上所必要的資訊電子化，標準化，以建立全球共通商業系統的無紙作業環境
description.en: Introduce the idea of information integration and exchange for the commercial environment. Also, by applying the business procedure re-engineering and information technology to establish necessary standard for paperless commercial environment.

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course includes international economic environment, culture and political differentiation, international marketing organization, marketing combinational decision, and international marketing information system.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。

description.en: This course focuses on application of statistical principles and methods. Course contains include Chi-square techniques, multivariate analysis of variance, trend analysis, covariance analysis, factor analysis and nonparametric tests.

name.en: Research in the Society of Education

description.zh: 縱覽教育社會學理論基礎，研習教育社會研究方法論，主題探討包含:技職教育與社會發展及社會心理學，重要論點在於如何透過教育社會學觀點，針對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: Overview of theories and research methodology in the society of education. Topics include collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, social psychology and analysis of conclusion or implications underlying from major research in the society of education to solve current issues of the technical-vocational education.

description.zh: 研究虛擬學習系統組成要素的發展背景、現況與未來，並探就不同生涯階段的學習者，運用虛擬學習系統的成功學習策略。
description.en: In-depth study of the fields of virtual learning. Topics include the components of virtual learning systems, development background, current status and perspective of virtual learning. Exploration of successful strategies for learners' using virtual learning systems in different career stages.

name.zh: 媒體與科技在遠距教育之應用
name.en: The Application of Media & Technology in Distance Education

description.zh: 研究電訊傳播系統、虛擬教室教學系統，隨選視訊教學系統等遠距教育系統的現況與發展，並研討學校遠距教育系統的規劃與教學策略設計。
description.en: Exploration of current status, development and perspective of distance education systems for instruction, including telecommunication systems, virtual classroom instruction systems, and video on demand instruction systems. In depth study of the planning of curriculum and instructive strategies in distance education.

description.zh: 教學心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派；教學領域的探索，教學效果影響變項的探索；教學心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢。
description.en: Examination of peculiarity, scope, theories, and research methodology on instructive psychology. Topics include behavioral approaches to instructive, cognitive approaches to instruction, and other related instructive theories, types of instruction, variables that affect instruction, and applications of instruction theories.

description.zh: (1) 探討比較技職教育的意義、發展與研究方法。(2) 介紹主要國家的技職教育制度。(3) 從事比較技職教育問題的分析。
description.en: (1) Examination of concepts, development and research methodology of comparative technical-vocational education.(2) Knowledge in comparison technical-vocational education in Chinese in terms of purpose system and problems with those of selected foreign countries.(3) Analysis of major research regarding contemporary trends and issues in comparative technical-vocational education.

name.en: Studies in Strategies of Instruction in Technical-Vocational

description.zh: 探討技職教學策略理論，並以課程分析、學校需求等因素為基礎，決定技職教學目標、教學內涵。並進行教學評鑑。
description.en: Trends in methodology for designing, and evaluating instruction in technical-vocational education at vocational high school and community college levels.

name.zh: 技職教育課程設計研究

description.zh: 探討課程設計理論並以職業分析、社會需求等因素為基礎，決定技職教育課程目標、課程內涵，並進行課程評鑑。
description.en: Exploration of theories of curriculum design as well as objectives, contents and planning of curriculum in technical- vocational education that meet society needs and career analysis. Critical Analysis and evaluation of curriculum in technical-vocational education.

name.en: Studies in Evaluation of School in Tecgbucal

description.zh: 探討技職學校評鑑理論，並以學校本位與需求為基礎，決定技職學校教育目標、辦學內涵。並進行學校評鑑。
description.en: Trfends in methodology for designing, and evaluating schoolin technical-vocational education at vocational high school and community college levels.

name.zh: 當代技職教育思想研究
name.en: Study of Contemporary Technical-Vocational Education Thought

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對當前技職教育思想重要課題，並挑選有興趣之子題提出心得報告。
description.en: Exploration of concepts and current issues underlying from major research on contemporary technical-vocational education thought. Discussion and selected topics research are required.

name.en: Administrative Management & Decision Making in Technical

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對技職行政組織、管理模式與決策原則進行個案探討。
description.en: Exploration of research in administrative organization, management models and principles of decision making in technical-vocation education. Case study, group discussion and reporting are required.

name.en: Study of Leadership in Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 本課程目標在研究技職學校領導原理與實務，課程內容包含課題討論、小組討論與個案研究。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the principles and practices of leadership in technical-vocational education. Case study, group meeting, and selected topics research are required.

description.zh: 以系統方略思考組織成長的動態歷程，研究組織內學習行為的變遷；包含個人、小團體，乃至群體間之智能之成長。
description.en: To study dynamic process of organization development by system approach thinking focusing on changing of learning behavior, including multi intelligent development of individual, small team, and group members.

description.zh: （一）認識人力資源發展策略之理論知識；（二）培養人力資源發展策略的能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展與組織策略之關係、人力資源發展實務模式分析、員工訓練發展之方法、組織發展策略、高階管理人員發展、跨文化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、企業參觀及個案研究等方法實施之。
description.en: An in-depth examination of planning, theories, and implementation in strategies of human resource management. Topics include staffing, development, appraisal, and rewards. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and case study.

description.zh: 研討內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探討、生涯決定因素、生涯技巧、生涯角色調適、生涯選擇與規劃技巧、生涯訪談、生涯高原調適、性別和職業歧視、雙生涯家庭、就業準備等主要生涯的研究與實作。
description.en: In-depth study of research in career development & guidance. Topics include an introduction to career idea, the exploration of interest, personality, and view of value, decision making of career, techniques of career development, adjustment of career role, choice and planning of career, interview, adjustment of career highness, adjustment of changing role, discrimination of gender and job, a family of two career parents, job preparation.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究--教育發展策略

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育教學發展策略，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in education development strategy. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research in education development strategy and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育校園環境，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in campus settings. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究--學校公共關係

description.zh: 研究生提出學校公共關係有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in school public relations. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in school public relation. Outcomes include the writing of research.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討各種高分子之聚合方法及動力學之研究，如逐步聚合、遊離基連鎖聚合、乳化聚合、離子連鎖聚合、連鎖共聚合反應、開環聚合、立體規則高分子之合成，未終止的游離基聚合方法。從分子量的分佈，結構物性之關係，作高分子聚合之最佳化設計，並且探討這些聚合方法如何應用在最新的科技上，如光電材料、複合材料。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the polymer synthesis and Kinetics studies. The synthesis includes step polymerization, free radical chain polymerization, emulsion polymerization, ionic chain polymerization, chain copolymerization, ring opening polymerization, sterospecific polymerization and living free radical polymerization. The synthesis scheme is optimized with the structure-properties relationship and molecular design. The potential application of these methods in high-tech materials, such as optoelectronics, and composites, will be elucidated.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 為使學生對高分子物理有所認識，本課程之設定將涵蓋所有高分子物理之相關課題，其主要內容分以下兩大部份(I)高分子之非結晶性質(II)高分子之結晶性質。而兩大部份中，又各分以下數單元講述:(I) 高分子之非結晶性質(a) 高分子鏈之機率結構(b) 分子鏈之運動方式(c) 高分子熱力學(d) 自由體積理論(含Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ之探討)(e) WLF經通曲線(II)高分子之結晶性質(a) 結晶晶格之分析(b) 高分子結晶度及順向度之估計(c) 結晶度對高分子機械性質，導電性質，及熱性質之影響(d) 溶液晶體與熔融晶體之比較(e) 熱結晶及張力結晶之比較
description.en: This course is designed to make students theroughly understand the problems related to polymer physics. The main content will include two major topics:(I)Amorphous Polymer(II)Crystalline Polymer.The detailed items included in the course are:(I) Amorphous Polymer (a) Random-Walk Theory for Chain Configuration(b) Chain Conformation and Movements(c) Polymer Thermodynamics(d) Free Volume Theory (including the study on Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ…etc.)(e) WLF Master Curve(II)Crystalline Polymer(a) Unit Cell Analysis(b) Polymer Crystallinity and Orientation Measurement(c) Effect of Crystallinity on Mechanical, Dielectrical, and Thermal Properties of Polymeric Materials (d) Solution Crystals vs. Melt Crystals(e) Thermal Induced Nucleation vs. Stress Induced Nucleation.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子?電路成像高分子?光電子成像材料?最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

description.zh: 「學校」（本課程特指『小學』）並非一單純的設施名稱，而是包含了老師與兒童、學生等人的群體、教育制度－特別是指與學習及教育系統的關聯性、及反映社會與文化背景之整體環境。本課程之內容，初期幾次先說明建築計畫的基本概念及近年來的轉變，以作為理解建築計畫學之基礎。而後進入授課主題，先嘗試從學校的基本知識，即從「教育」、「班級」、「課程」、及「教室」等教育用語之歷史性的考察為起始，了解近代「教育」與「學校」之發展過程。進而以目前國內外教育改革的主要課題－開放教育與開放式學校作為討論的重心。最後以與學校建築相關之各種的研究觀點與方法，及以學習與生活場所為基礎之學校環境論等的論述為總結，期望藉此作為將來學校建築規劃設計之參考。
description.en: It's not a name of facility simply, for a school. Schools are the integral environment where contain the users of teachers and children, education system, and reflecting social and cultural background. The contents of this course that firstly; explain the basic concepts and the transition in recently of Architectural Planning. Secondly, interpret the historical meaning and the transition of radical educational wordings in schools, such as "education", "class", "curriculum", "classroom" etc, in order to understand the processes of development in schooling. Besides, discuss the issues of educational reforms that focus on the open-education and open-school. Lastly, review different approaches to the researches of schools. For the practical planning and design for schools; meanwhile as the conclusion of this course, discussing the theory of school environment base on the point at issue that school is the learning and living places.

description.zh: 本課程主要為討論台灣地區建築上的風土特色，以及本地各歷史階段之建築回應此特質所提供的建築成就或特色。
description.en: This course explores the vernacular character of Taiwanese architecture and architectural achievement and characteristics in response to the character during respective historical periods.

description.zh: 為使都市安全防災的理論與實務能相互結合，特別以921震災後之重建為主題，作為實務訓練，所以本課程授課主要內容分為三部分：第一部份為都市防災概論，此部分主要針對國內外文獻作一回顧，進而瞭解都市防災整體架構，區分為（1）文獻回顧；（2）防災基本計畫；及（3）防災整體架構等。第二部份為都市與都市計畫防災，此部分從防災理論著手，逐漸導入都市計畫防災實務，最後提出防災都市計畫作業的方式與內容，期使國內都市計畫能逐步邁向防災都市計畫，以建立『安全都市』為目標。此部分的主要內容區分為：（1）都市災害風險理念的形成；（2）防災都市計畫與地區防災系統規劃；（3）都市計畫防災系統規劃原則；（4）都市計畫防災作業準則內容架構；（5）都市計畫防災作業準則；（6）安心都市計畫的形成與實現。第三部分為實務操作部分，以草屯鎮為例，藉九二一大地震的實例，深入探討災情調查的方法，實際調查狀況及研訂災後重建的程序與計畫內容，期望成為國內都市重建計畫的範例，主要內容區分為：（1）緒論；（2）重建理論；（3）草屯鎮現況發展；（4）災情調查方法與重建程序之建立；（5）災情調查分析與重建計畫內容研訂等。
description.en: The subject will be presented in three partsPart One - (1) Literature retrospection; (2) Fundamental planning for disaster prevention; (3) An integrated disaster prevention organization.Part Two -The major contents to be addressed include (1) Formation of urban disaster cataclysm and risk; (2) Urban disaster prevention plan and regional disaster protection system planning; (3) Principles for planning disaster prevention system in urban plan; (4) Operational standards and organization for urban disaster prevention; (5) Operational guidelines for urban disaster prevention; (6) Realization and formation of trouble free urban plan.Party Three -. The major contents are (1) Introduction; (2) rehabilitation theory; (3) Current development in Tsaotun City; (4) Establishment of damage survey method and rehabilitation procedures; (5) Detail analysis of damage survey report and preparation of rehabilitation plan content

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討台灣地區從日據時期至民國八十年代都市規劃範型的演變，內容包括各歷史階段中的經濟、社會及政治背景的主要特徵，以及對應在都市規劃作業上的實際狀況。並藉由案例分析，使學生更深入認識都市規劃的本質及其背後各種支配力量和限制因素。
description.en: The course mainly explores the urban planning history during last one hundred years in Taiwan. The changing paradigms and the social, economic, and political contexts of each time period are discussed.In addition, many planning cases are analyzed to obtain the better ideas of what the characteristics of urban planning, the dominated powers behind, and the limitations are.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討調查研究法與統計學之理論基礎，課程著重其在工業設計領域內的實際運用情形。
description.en: This course is designed to study the theoretical foundation of survey and statistical reasoning that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. The course focuses on its' application in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 講授並整合設計評價之基本理論。訓練學生針對產品之開發動機、消費者需要(needs)、市場策略、機能佈局、人機介面訴求、造形策略及創意，評估產品設計過程中思考與決策之品質，進而形成改善設計品質之建議。（本課程非本人所提議，以上課程概述僅供參考，並請提議老師指教。）
description.en: Lecture on theory and practice of Design Criticism. Discussions lead toanalysis of quality and effectiveness in design philosophy and practiceamong steps of product development process, including marketing strategy,fulfilling uses' needs, product functioning, ergonomics emphasis and stylingaccent.

description.zh: 坐具與人類生活之關係密切，中西因文化背景生活方式不同，產生很多不同樣式之坐具，本課程旨在研究探討坐具外形、結構、材料、與其功能，並從人類行為生活習慣和人因介面探討本課程。
description.en: A general investigation of construction, materials, and form of seating device follows by examining human lifestyle and ergonomics of seating that are applicable to the design of modern seating devices.

description.zh: 透過對全球同質性產品創新概念與工業設計專案互動介面之解構，並強調本土化工業設計專案特質，提出可行之設計整合與發展模式。期望能夠達成：1.由概念至立體精模之產品埸景、架構與意象之整合流程。2.產品創新價值、人本中心及美學之基本理論準則之建立。
description.en: The study of the dynamic interaction model between product innovation and industrial design project development. It focuses on the indigenous design project remodeling and creates the feasible and integrated design process by concerning product scenario, architecture and imaging.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解4R之原理，此包括：1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4.廢棄物生命週期之分析 5.減廢策略與管理體系
description.en: "Resource Recovery and Managemet" is a course to introduce the principle of 4R in waste management. Contents of the course consist of approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

Image Restoration ４.Color Image Processing ５. Morphological Image Processing ６. Image Segmentation 7. Object Recognition 8. Wavelet and Multiresolution Processing
