description.zh: 造形藝術是含蓋平面與立體之形的組合，造形藝術包容室內與室外的公共藝術，有美化環境陶冶人性的功能。城市、社區的美化和總體營造需而以造形藝術原理來發揮應用。本課程著重在理論與視覺化之研究。
description.en: Study of theory and visualized practice of art form that consists of two and three dimension form study including their visual features and ways of composition.

description.zh: 使用者、設計品、使用情境及設計者間之記號模式、記號架構、記號表達及記號溝通、記號認知及記號操作之理論。
description.en: This course provides theory of interaction design related topics on cognitive Semiotics between user, object and designer. This is where the viewpoint of sign model and sign operation

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

description.zh: 講授學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程之目標在於呈現各種研究方法的特質與限制，進而引導初學者以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的研究策略，最後得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。上述研究策略包括：文獻探討的方法與策略，蒐集研究資料的方法與策略，抽樣的效用與策略，及資料分析的策略等。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in research. This course aims to present learners with a variety of research methods and conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 逆向工程已成為電腦輔助產品開發技術重要的一環，透過三次元量測或掃瞄技術，取得工件表面的點資料，據以建構3D CAD幾何模型(Geometric model)，以供後續設計、電腦輔助工程分析(CAE)與電腦輔助製造(CAM)之應用。逆向工程的程序分為三個階段：(1)擷取工件表面的點資料；(2)點資料的前置處理；以及(3)建構或更新幾何模型。依此流程，本課程首先講述各類運用於逆向工程中的量測與掃瞄技術，並以設計應用觀點為基礎，討論其間的差異與優缺點，隨著運用領域的不同，而採取不同的量測技術；其次介紹點資料前置處理的理念與方法，從現有文獻中，解析的相關的技術，因量測技術與策略的差異，而發展出不同的處理技術；至於，重建或更新原有的幾何模型的部分，將著重設計實務的應用，並與現有的CAD系統整合的策略。課程之目標，為使修習本課程之學生能對逆向工程的相關理論與技術，有全盤的認識與瞭解，並透過實際案例的操作，訓練學生能具備實務作業能力。
description.en: Reverse engineering has become an important tool for geometric model construction in 3D CAD based on the data points, digitized from an existing part, for the downstream applications such as CAE and CAM. The process of reverse engineering can usually be subdivided into three stages, i.e. (1) part digitization for capturing the data points; (2) data point pre-processing; and (3) CAD modeling and/or updating. In this course, the relevant techniques in the three stages of reverse engineering procedure are introduced firstly. Through the project practice, the student is able to adept to the techniques of reverse engineering.

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，其中包括：一因子實驗 ‧區集和拉丁方格 ‧不完全區集設計 ‧多因子實驗 ‧部份因子實驗 ‧巢狀或階層實驗 ‧變異數分析 ‧迴歸分析 ‧交互變異分析
description.en: Introduce the experiment design methods and conclusion. Such as: one factor experiment, Latin square, Multi factors experiment, ANOVA, regression.

description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 本課程是較大學部的「岩石力學」課程為之深入探討岩石行為的課程，將針對岩石的指數性質、透水性、強度及變形性做更詳細的研究，並將比較岩石和土壤的不同，以及介紹機率概念在岩石力學上的應用。上課時將以研究論文為主，，書籍、報告為輔，其涵蓋的課程內容大致如下：1、岩石的指數性質2、岩石和土壤的不同3、岩體分類法4、岩石的透水性5、立體投影圖6、岩石的強度7、岩石的破壤準則8、岩石的變形性9、弱面的分析10、機率在岩石力學上的應用
description.en: Compared to the undergraduate Rock Mechanics course, this is a more advanced course to examine the behaviors of rocks under different stress conditions。 It will focus on the index properties, the permeability properties, the strength properties, and the deformation properties of rocks。 In addition, it will address the difference between rocks and soils by contrast。 Finally, this course will introduce students to the concept of probability, and how it can be applied to the Rock Mechanics。 The students taking this course will have plenty of reading assignments, and are required to participate in the classroom discussions。

description.zh: 資料庫是任何完整的資訊管理系統之不可或缺的一部份，並且已經在各行各業中顯示其與日俱增的重要性，當然土木工程也不例外。尤其近年來地理資訊系統、營建管理系統及地質鑽孔資料庫的發展，更促使土木工程師正視資料庫的重要性，並學習如何有效地管理龐大的相關資訊。因此，本課程的設計即針對此需要來教導學生熟悉現代資料庫系統的設計與技術，以使他們在畢業後更具有競爭力，更容易找到理想的工作。課程的內容將包括資料處理、概念設計、關連式資料模型、及正規化等領域，而學生必須在學期中設計並完成一個完整的資料庫作為專題計畫。關於本課程的其他細節請見下述課程大綱。
description.en: Database (DB) is an integral part of any information management system, and has been playing a significant role in many academic programs and professions, including the civil engineering, construction engineering, and environmental engineering. In recent years, the development of Geographical Information System, Construction Decision Support System, and Geotechnical Data Bank all require practicing civil engineers to understand the principles of underlying data storage and to develop an effective style of data management to achieve competitiveness in the market place. Therefore, it is the focus of this course to guide the students to become familiar with various technical aspects of modern DB systems so that they can perform the above-mentioned tasks and become more employable. This course will cover areas such as data processing, conceptual DB design, relational data model, and normalization. The students are required to complete a semester project and implement a functional DB.

It includes: origin of water, distribution and circulation, reserve of underground water, physical and chemical properties of underground water and the relationship between hydrology and engineering geology.  It also discuss environmental concerns of engineering to the hydrology system.

description.zh: 地球自生成以來，其組成與結構一直在改變。今日的岩體即是這種長期改變的結果。地質學是研究岩體組成與結構變化的科學，目的在於掌握這種變化的軌跡，而構造地質學是地質學裡專門研究岩體結構變化的一分科。所謂的岩體結構（即地質構造）是指一個岩體的形狀、尺寸及其內部組成顆粒的排列情形。要了解結構的變化，無論是定性或定量，先要了解岩體的原始結構，從而才能了解現在所觀察到的岩體結構是否發生過變化。雖然構造地質學的目的是由現在既成的結構去了解地球的結構變化，但是就現在地球的結構，我們所能觀察到的岩體結構，大多被植生或土壤所覆蓋，即使偶有露出，也僅是其立體結構的某一表面而已，因此如何利用這些零星有限且是平面的岩體結構去推論地殼整體的結構，是必須首先解決的問題。面對這樣的問題，研究構造地質學應從大處著眼、小處著手，先從了解一個地區某一個露頭的現在結構開始，並由理論及實驗所得的結果推論這個岩體的結構變化過程，再由這些零星露頭的結構及其結構變化過程的資料，去推論、去拼湊涵蓋這些露頭地區的結構，由點而線、由線而面，終而包括整個地殼。本課程為構造地質學的進階課程，主要討論以下之主題：岩石的力學性質與變形行為、應變分
description.en: Structural geology is a branch of earth science. It has developed rapidly over the past decade. The reason for the recent advances in structural geology has been the realization that naturally deformed rocks seen in field outcrops contain a fantastic range of small-scale features which relate directly to large-scale orogenic deformation systems. The other reason has been the realization that rock deformation, like any other form of deformation, obeys well-defined physical and chemical laws. Base on this situation, this course is intended to serve as an accompaniment to techniques-based courses in structural geology or as an accompaniment to the laboratory portion of a postgraduate course. Systematic study of this advanced structural geology course includes several topics: mechanic proporties and deformation behaviors of rocks, strain analysis, ductile geologic structures, brittle geologic structures, and applied structural geology.

NDT methods: ultrasonic testing, magnetoscopic inspections, eddy current testing, radiographic technique, penetrants method. NDT of materials: conductive materials, magnetic materials, ceramics, composite materials. NDT of structures: mechanical components, specific structures. NDT images: PC-based data acquisition, data analysis and image process.

description.zh: 設計之本質在建構新經驗，創造即做出新經驗，新經驗是未知，未知的求解即「解題」，經由主體的解題思考模式推演而得。對於主體而言經驗是相對的，經驗無法直接傳遞，必須經主體與客體間之交互建構，內化後才能成為主體之經驗。空間結構為一意義表達之外顯形式，創作者藉由此表層結構傳達其新經驗。此新經驗必須建構於創作者意識內於先，是為深層結構，再依此深層之意義形諸於外。因此創作者應是在從事一系列的行為，包括建構一意義之深層結構至轉化成一傳達意義之表層結構。 誘導式結構為一主體的「解題」思考模式；從已知成份著手分析歸納，以推論那尚未知悉的成份，終而掌握所欲追求之「解」。這種認知是在主體內經由誘導式結構.操作模型之引導，自「不知」轉為「知」，使主體在已知與未知之間搭建其誘導式結構。本理論授課分為：課程一，「誘導式結構理論」課程二，「誘導式結構理論應用」
description.en: HS is a thinking model for problem solving, an analysis of the 'known' in order to master the 'unknown' to solve the problem.  The subjective party's cognition is guided by the HS manipulating model, the transfer from 'unknown' to 'known', lets the subjective party construct a heuristic structure in between known and unknown.  The HS theory instruction consists of two courses 1,"The Heuristic Structure Theory"2,"The Application of The Heuristic Structure Theory"

description.zh: 本課程主要講授建築+都市設計之理念（A + U），並給予學生作適當的練習，模型製作與電腦模擬，讓研究生藉由此門課程之訓練能深入瞭解建築形式與風格、建築街道景觀及其他等之練習。實習內容：1. 建築與都市設計管制模擬：含開放空間、建築形式、量體、人行系統、汽車出入口及其他等，以一個已實施都市設計管制區為例，調查及分析該區建築的整體風貌。2. 建築與街道景觀設計綜合實習：綜合練習建築與街道景觀之設計，含街道空間之地景設計實習。
有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

description.zh: 面臨我國高齡化社會的趨勢下，老人與環境的議題急待重視。在觀察老人與環境互動的過程中，需將老人的生活空間經驗置入於生活變遷、社會關係及文化脈絡的向度中來討論。本課程是綜合心理學、心理學、社會學、建築與都市規劃等多面向學科來探討老人的身心特性及老年生活環境之需求。
description.en: Facing a trend toward the aging society, the issue about the elderly and environment is supposed to be valued. In view of the process of the elderly and environment interaction , this research puts the living space experience of Taiwan elderly into the living transition, social relation and culture context for sector consideration. It is a complexity course integrated with Psychology, Physiology, Sociology, Architecture and Urban planning in order to study the characters of physiological and psychological of the elderly and the need of living environment.

description.zh: 本課程以探討都市再生過程中種種再開發模式及策略為主軸，透過不同類型之各國都市再開發案例進行專題討論分析比較。討論主題以當代環境主流議題為優先，包括：日本親水環境案例水岸空間開發案例綠建築與生態社區永續生態都市(歐洲生態小學案例)都市防災公園設計規劃商業空間更新（商店街、形象商圈，美國主街計劃）社區總體營造與都市更新車站周邊區域更新閒置空間、歷史街區保存與都市發展特殊產業之再開發案例介紹與解析6. 都市設計相關議題7. 民眾參與8. 管理維護組織9. 案例介紹與解析
description.en: This course regards different strategies & redevelopment types as the central concept to discuss about the issues of urban regeneration through survey different examples of different countries which consisted of several parts mentioned as below: the redevelopment projects of waterfrontthe redevelopment projects of ecology community & green buildingthe redevelopment projects of eco-citythe plan & design of disaster prevention parkthe redevelopment projects of commercial areathe redevelopment projects of station neighborhoodthe conservation of historical area the redevelopment projects of industry area

description.zh: 本課程授課主要分成六項：（1）從都市歷史發展，討論過去、現在與未來；（2）以永續都市發展理論，探討都市型態及設計理論；（3）以都市空間的構成探討解讀、架構及產生的理論；（4）以都市空間的形成探討社會過程、技術過程及創造過程：（5）以都市實質設計的涵構探討都市的實質、自然及人文設計，並藉以討論土地使用、開放空間、建築形式與量體、流通動線、停車場、街道家具及支持活動等；（6）以都市設計的技術探討主要計畫、細部計畫、都市計畫通盤檢討、都市更新、土地使用分區管制及都市景觀管制等技術性課題
description.en: The subject is hereby divided into six parts (1) discussing the past, present and future from standpoint of the chronicle of urban development; (2) exploring the urban pattern and design theory be referring to on-going urban development; (3) inquiring into the theory of formation, configuration and generation and urban space; (4) searching the social process, technical process and creation process through the formation of urban space; (5) from the virtual, natural and cultural design to review the proper layout of land use, open space, building pattern and volume, flow dynamic line, parking lot, road, furniture and support for citizen activity; (6) technically reviewing the main urban plan, detail plan, overall review of urban plan, urban renewal, land use, zone control and urban landscape.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在提供瞭解會影響住宅建設之多元觀點，與考慮及強化有關住宅政策、土地使用規劃及其他領域之關係。因此，本課程將藉由對住宅研究一般課題、對策及創新作法的基礎瞭解，以培養理論與實務的知能。故本課程主要內容包括： 一、住宅概論。 二、目前國內外住宅政策與實務課題。 三、住宅供需研究。 四、住宅興建與營建產業。 五、住宅財務與支出。 六、公私部門住宅建設。 七、綠住宅與永續都市。 八、住宅研究的必要規劃措施：住宅、土地使用規劃管制、生態環境、交通運輸、資源管理、財政等
description.en: The aims of this course are to provide an understanding of the variety of perspectives that influence housing development, consider the nature of the relationships between policy, land use planning, and other areas. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1. Introduction. 2. Current international and domestic housing policy and practical issues. 3. The state of housing need/demand/supply. 4. House building and the construction industry. 5. Housing finance and expenditure. 6. Public and private housing development. 7. Green residential building and sustainable cities. 8. Balancing planning needs in housing studies: housing, land-use planning, ecological environment, transportation, resource management and financing concerns.

The nature of  Green Building and Symbiosis Building.4.	The discussion of Green Building and Life Cycle.5.	The technology and method of Green Building Planning.6.	The Planning of Green Community and Green City.

description.zh: 授課內容主要在介紹從事都市計畫或都市設計經常習用有關都市方面的資料蒐集、調查以及分析的各種方法，重點涵蓋都市空間理論、人口、產業、交通成長理論及相關的資料調查技術。所使用的分析方法包括統計分析、模式運用、地理資訊系統及試算表分析等，並以實例介紹有關都市人口、產業活動、交通運輸量的分析及預測，使學生能將學習的理論與與實務相結合，增進都市分析的專業能力。
description.en: The course focus is on the training of urban analysis methods to urban planning and design professions. The theories about urban spatial planning, population forecasting, economic development, and transportation analysis are introduced. Emphasis is laid on the methods of data collection and investigation techniques, geographic information system operation, statistics analysis, and spreadsheet utilization. Students are required to complete some related applications to improve both their academic abilities and professional capabilities.

The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.en: The course includes a brief introduction of the basics of medical physiology, and followed by the introduction of the fundamental principles of operation, applications and design of the medical instruments most commonly used in hospitals.

The contents of this course are: (1)Real-time Computer Control System Introduction, (2)Concept of Computer Control, (3)Computer Hardware Requirement for Real-time Computer Control System, (4) Computer Control Implementation, (5)Operating Systems (6)Real-time Computer Control System Design, (7)Real-time Computer Control System Performance Analysis.

description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the principle of biochemistry, including biomolecular conformation, generation and storage of metabolic energy, biosynthesis of macromolecular precursors, genetic information, some aspects of human biochemistry.

description.zh: 講述有關低溫電漿的特徵、性能及有機高分子纖維、生醫素材方面的應用。因高分子表面的改質，使濕潤性、接著性、染色性、帶電性、印刷性等獲致改善，附與高機能功能性。並針對處理時的條件，包括氣體的種類、真空度、壓力、功率、時間、流量等因素，探討對高分子素材表面改質的影響和效果。配合SEM、ESCA、接觸角等儀器的分析、觀測高分子表面構造的變化及成分的變異，以研究高分子表面的改質。
description.en: Lecture for the characteristic of low temperature plasma. as  well as its application in organic polymer fiber and biomedical material. The submicron modification of polymer surface can improve wettibility, adhesion, dyeing behavior, electrification, and printing properties for endow material with high performance. Explain for the plasma treating conditions, such as gas  variety、vacuum、 pressure、power、 time、 flow rate etc., are also discussed in order to study their influence and effect in Polymer Material surface modification. The surface structure and component change are analyzed by SEM, ESCA and contact angle instruments to investigate the modification on polymer surface.

In view of the process of the elderly and environment interaction , this research puts the living space experience of Taiwan elderly into the living transition, social relation and culture context for sector consideration. It is a complexity course integrated with Psychology, Physiology, Sociology, Architecture and Urban planning in order to study the characters of physiological and psychological of the elderly and the need of living environment.

name.zh: 建築施工災害與應變措施
name.en: Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures

description.zh: 基礎開挖施工作業的災害最主要的是擋土牆的傾倒,這是源自於隆起、砂湧及管湧的現象。開挖區的土壤為砂土,如果擋土牆漏水,由於淘空所形成的管湧,會導致鄰房的損壞;由於擋土牆貫入深度的不足以及點井措施的不良,會造成開挖區的砂源,最終導致擋土牆的傾倒。開挖區的土壤如果為粘土,而且粘土含水量大於液限,則開挖區的粘土產生塑性液,使支撐系統挫屈破壞,最後造成擋土牆的破壞。這些原理皆為課程的內容。此外,當基礎施工災害的機制了解之後,再講授如果發現災害的徵兆,如何採取必要的緊急應變措施, 使災害消失於無形,這些應變措施分別按照技術及行政層面來敘述。
description.en: 英文名稱:Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures  The hazand during foundation excavation is retaining wall failure, this may be caused by heaving、boiling and piping。If excavation is conducted in granular soil in which retaining wall is found leaking, the migration of silty soil will trigger piping and eventually wall failure。 If excave embedded depth of retaining wall and point walls are insufficient, this can cause boiling and lead to wall failure。 If encavation is in cohesive soil and water content is higher than liquid limit, plastic flow will lead to huckling of bracing system and to the wall failure。 After the various failure mechanisms are explained, how to identify the symptoms and how to take urgent remedial measures both technology and administration are explained accordingly。

description.zh: 知識管理是二十一世紀知識與學習型企業發展知識經濟最主要的技能，而營建與土木工程是一個需要專業知識的技術型產業，故亦應融入知識管理之理念。本課程基於上述理念，分別介紹營建興土木工程之相關專業技能，知識管理與企業e化發展技術，進而探討營建導入知識管理之技巧與方法。
description.en: Knowledge Management(KM) is the most important technique of learning type business for developing knowledge economy in the 21st century.Construction and civil engineering need to conduct knowledge management due to they are complex and full with professional techniques.This course will introduce related professional techniques of construction and civil engineering,the development technology of knowledge management and a e business,also will illustrate the conducting methods of construction knowledge management.

description.zh: 為使學生對高分子物理有所認識，本課程之設定將涵蓋所有高分子物理之相關課題，其主要內容分以下兩大部份(I)高分子之非結晶性質(II)高分子之結晶性質。而兩大部份中，又各分以下數單元講述:(I) 高分子之非結晶性質(a) 高分子鏈之機率結構(b) 分子鏈之運動方式(c) 高分子熱力學(d) 自由體積理論(含Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ之探討)(e) WLF經通曲線(II)高分子之結晶性質(a) 結晶晶格之分析(b) 高分子結晶度及順向度之估計(c) 結晶度對高分子機械性質，導電性質，及熱性質之影響(d) 溶液晶體與熔融晶體之比較(e) 熱結晶及張力結晶之比較
description.en: This course is designed to make students theroughly understand the problems related to polymer physics. The main content will include two major topics:(I)Amorphous Polymer(II)Crystalline Polymer.The detailed items included in the course are:(I) Amorphous Polymer (a) Random-Walk Theory for Chain Configuration(b) Chain Conformation and Movements(c) Polymer Thermodynamics(d) Free Volume Theory (including the study on Tg ,Tα,Tβ,Tγ…etc.)(e) WLF Master Curve(II)Crystalline Polymer(a) Unit Cell Analysis(b) Polymer Crystallinity and Orientation Measurement(c) Effect of Crystallinity on Mechanical, Dielectrical, and Thermal Properties of Polymeric Materials (d) Solution Crystals vs. Melt Crystals(e) Thermal Induced Nucleation vs. Stress Induced Nucleation.

description.zh: 由於世界各國對自來水水質標準逐漸提高，因此，自來水高級處理已變成目前國際上飲用水研究之主要趨勢。此外在台灣，由於河川受污水下水道普及率低及工業污染之影響下，原水水質長久不佳。傳統處理程序已無法因應消費者之需求，高雄水質不佳即是最好例子。因此，本課程之重點嘉集中高級自來水之處理程序，如薄膜逆滲透、超過濾、為過濾、臭氧等高級氧化程序與有機物吸附等處理程序。
description.en: Because of the tightened regulation enacted by many countries, advanced drinking water treatment technology has been the research focus all around the world. In addition, in Taiwan, water resource, including surface and ground water, are seriously polluted due to industrial discharge and low sewerage system connection ratio. Traditional treatment processes, such as coagulation, sedimentation, filtration, are not enough for water purification for these deterioraated raw water gualities. Therefoore, this class will offer the opportunity to improve the knowledge for advanced drinking water treatment technology, including reverse osmosis, nanofiltration, ozone disinfection, GAC adsorption, and me.

Improper usage of natural resources will bring adverse results. The topic will include: fundamental ecology, mass and energy transfer and the impact of industrial development on ecology.

This course provides the necessary theoretical perspectives and historical distances and its contents contain pluralism-oriented reflections of (1) design thoughts and movements: modernism and post-modernism, structuralism and post-structuralism, capitalism and socialism, and (2) design discourses: behavioral research, systematic science, cognitive science, linguistics, history, sociology, and alternative design).

description.zh: 此課程之目標是講授生物化學原理，包含生物分子構形、代謝能源之製造與儲存，生物大分子之合成，基因訊息，人類生化之觀點。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the principle of biochemistry, including biomolecular conformation, generation and storage of metabolic energy, biosynthesis of macromolecular precursors, genetic information, some aspects of human biochemistry.

description.zh: 講述有關低溫電漿的特徵、性能及有機高分子纖維、生醫素材方面的應用。因高分子表面的改質，使濕潤性、接著性、染色性、帶電性、印刷性等獲致改善，附與高機能功能性。並針對處理時的條件，包括氣體的種類、真空度、壓力、功率、時間、流量等因素，探討對高分子素材表面改質的影響和效果。配合SEM、ESCA、接觸角等儀器的分析、觀測高分子表面構造的變化及成分的變異，以研究高分子表面的改質。
description.en: Lecture for the characteristic of low temperature plasma. as  well as its application in organic polymer fiber and biomedical material. The submicron modification of polymer surface can improve wettibility, adhesion, dyeing behavior, electrification, and printing properties for endow material with high performance. Explain for the plasma treating conditions, such as gas  variety、vacuum、 pressure、power、 time、 flow rate etc., are also discussed in order to study their influence and effect in Polymer Material surface modification. The surface structure and component change are analyzed by SEM, ESCA and contact angle instruments to investigate the modification on polymer surface.

description.zh: 隨著自動化科技與資訊技術的日益精進，產業生產活動必須結合這些相關技術，朝向自動化及電子化目標以改善企業體質，提升企業競爭力。本課程之主要目標便是教導學生關於生產自動化及企業電子化之相關知識以及進行製商整合時所需之觀念及技術。
description.en: The manufacturing system becomes more complex due to the more competitive situation occurring in the marketplace. In order to survive，the enterprise must combine the automation technology and information technology to improve the manufacturing activities for fulfilling the need of production. Therefore ,  the aim of this course is to teach the concept and technology for manufacturing automation and electronic business.

description.zh: 本課程包含ERP系統演進，全球運籌管理，ERP系統軟硬體結構，及企業管理智慧系統。
description.en: This course includes: ERP development history, global logistic strategy, ERP software and hardware infrastructures, and enterprise management intelligence system.

description.zh: 本課程內容共分零售基本概念、零售規劃技巧、零售機構之管理、零售之行銷組合及零售之應用與未來趨勢等五篇。第一篇「零售基本概念」，介紹零售的本質，描述零售機構的型態及台灣零售業之發展與未來趨勢。第二篇「零售規劃技巧」，說明如何訂定零售策略及進行零售研究，闡述商圈規劃與分析，並且探討零售地點選擇的決策流程與評估技術。第三篇「零售機構之管理」，先敘述零售組織規劃，然後討論零售業人力資料管理的程序及重點，也論及零售機構財務規劃、分析及預算制度。第四篇「零售行銷組合」，以行銷組合（產品、訂價、通路及促銷）之概念，分別討論店面設計與商品展示、商品採購與管理，零售訂價技巧及步驟，零售促銷規劃與活動。第五篇「零售之應用與未來趨勢」，將零售管理之學理及概念應用於更廣泛之場合，包括直接銷售（Direct Selling）及綠色零售（Green Retailing），最後針對零售管理之未來趨勢探討科技應用在零售管理，網路行銷及虛擬商店。
description.en: There are five sections in this course. The first section will introduce the basic concepts of retailing which the fundamental concepts, the models of organization and the future. The second section, the skills of retailing planning, the strategy and research are discussed. The analyses of business circle and store location are decided by several different technologies. The third section-the way of establishing organization and managing the human resources, the financial planning, and budgeting are included. The fourth section；the combination of marketing, the concept of 4P（product, price, path and promotion）, the shop design and product demonstration, produce purchasing and managing, the decision of price and the activities of promotion are included. The fifth section；the future implementation of retailing, the direct selling and green retailing are included. The use of high-tech in retailing and internet marketing and virtual store are discussed in this section.

description.zh: 透過講課、討論、專題報告的方式，瞭解投資的擬定、報酬與風險分析、執行與評估方法，並探討不同因素對投資之影響，期提供良好的投資決策。
description.en: The objective of this course lies in definition of investment, return and risk analysis, investment execution and evaluation methods. Various factors that affect the investment decision problems are discussed to help decision-maker properly resolves investment decision-making.

description.zh: 探討產品機能和成本配合的關係，綜合企業內所有知識和技能，做有系統、有組織的設計、材料種類、與型態改善，以達成降低成本，提高製程功能和品質。
description.en: Value Management (VM) is an organized, systematic approach to obtaining optimal value for every industry. The learning and training topics are: the system approach, opportunities, application and methodology for value management. Also, involve managing project value through lift cycle costing, problem solving and project value and case studies.

description.zh: 1.策略管理者的特徵責任及風格 2.企業環境的偵察 3.策略形成 4.策略執行與評估 5.資訊科技與管理，高科技公司與多國籍企業的策略管理
description.en: This course attempts to define and analyze many the issue and function involved in management. The objection is to provide a set of frameworks for the development and analysis of strategic planning. The course seeks to structure the key dimension and the process of the strategic planning.

description.zh: 結合工作衡量之基礎及人事管理之應用，並使用工業工程之基本管理知識，使學生瞭解績效管理之概念、程序、方法及步驟，達成最終提昇工作績效之目地。
description.en: Combining the work measurement and personnel management applications to make the students realize the concept、procedure、methods of performance management. To improve performance of work is the target of this course.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解行銷通路之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路與行銷管理的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程，通路結構，通路行為，通路溝通，通路策略及通路續效評估等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in marketing channel. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making channel decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations, and a term paper.

description.zh: 進階的軟、硬體應用與技術的介紹。課程內容主要集中於設計理論的思考過程與現有最新的電腦輔助設計等相關軟硬體間的密切關係; 例如, 如何利用適當的現有最新設備技術之結合並運用於設計過程的創造和表現。
description.en: Advanced media techniques.  It is organized in two related areas: Computer Aided Design and Design Theory.  Computer Aided Design focuses on the use and development of computational tools in the service of design.  Design Theory focuses on the conceptual and formal ideas associated with computation and deals with their application and development.  Students also utilize computer aided sequence manipulation and image compositing tools in the production of multimedium-multilayered video.

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

description.zh: 本課程將探討各種識別之技巧，包含：使用距離及相似性之分類之方法，分群之方法，使用監督學習及非監督學習之類神經網路，特徵萃取之方法，文法式圖形識別法，及應用範例。
description.en: This course covers the following topics; classification by distance functions and likelihood functions,clustering algorithms,neural networks with supervised and unsupervised learning, issues of fdature extraction, syntactic pattern recognition, and examples of applications.

description.zh: 熱交換器應用、熱交換器設計簡介、熱傳分析、熱交換性能分析、熱交換器鰭片分析、熱交換器低溫應用分析
description.en: Applications of heat exchangers, introduction to heat exchanger design, heat transfer analysis, performance analysis of heat exchanger, analysis of heat exchanger fin design, analysis of low temperature applications

description.en: Pollution source analysis, indoor air quality standards, balance of concentration, air filtration theories and designs, building ventilation standards, bio-clean room standards, chemical filtration, discussion on ASHRAE standard 62.

name.en: Special Topics of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 本課程之內容主要訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對土木防災之認識，進而學習土木工程在防災上的應用，並進行專題報告、專題演講及研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding precaution of civil engineering for students. This course is also learning the application of precaution of civil engineering. In the class we have case study, seminar, and group meeting.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department. Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included

Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種實驗之配置法及統計分析方法和結論，其中包括：一因子實驗 ‧區集和拉丁方格 ‧不完全區集設計 ‧多因子實驗 ‧部份因子實驗 ‧巢狀或階層實驗 ‧變異數分析 ‧迴歸分析 ‧交互變異分析
description.en: Introduce the experiment design methods and conclusion. Such as: one factor experiment, Latin square, Multi factors experiment, ANOVA, regression.

description.zh: 本課程介紹現有無線區域網路規格的多工存取層及實體層，並深入解說規格中所使用通訊技術的原理，如載波偵測多工－避免碰撞通訊協定，正交分頻多工調變技術。
description.en: This course contains the medium access control layer(MAC) and physical layer(PHY) of the mose recent IEEE 802.11 standards for wireless local area networks. Thechniques employed by the standards, e.g.,craier sense multiple access/collision avoidance (CSMA/CA),orthogonal frequency-division multiplexing (OFDA), will be discussed in details.

description.zh: 藉由戶外家具案例之分析探討公共環境與人類行為間之關係及公共戶外家具之材料、造形、人機介面、維護與安全等因素，並經由討論形成公共戶外家具之設計思維。
description.en: Case studies on outdoors furniture design to examine the relationship between open space environment and human behavior. The design factors of material, form, ergonomics, maintenance and safety will be studied. Design philosophy of outdoors furniture is to be deliberating in the discussions.

description.zh: 講授學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程之目標在於呈現各種研究方法的特質與限制，進而引導初學者以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的研究策略，最後得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。上述研究策略包括：文獻探討的方法與策略，蒐集研究資料的方法與策略，抽樣的效用與策略，及資料分析的策略等。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in research. This course aims to present learners with a variety of research methods and conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對購併相關議題有確實的瞭解，包括1.合併的動機與理論介紹，2.購併的型態與策略規畫，3.公司購併時的法律規畫4.美、日、歐金融控股公司發展與比較，5.美國與日本銀行購併案例之探討6.金融控股公司相關議題，7.合併後之相關整合規畫等
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding Mergers and Acquisitions. Topics are as follows: 1.Theory of M&A, 2.Types of M&A and Strategic Planning, 3.Legal Planning, 4. Types of FHC in the U.S., Japan, and Europe, 5.Case Study on M&A of Japanese Banks and U.S. Banks, 7.Topics on Financial Holding Companies, 8 .Integration after M&A.

Basic electromagnetic theory 2.Reflection and transmission of plane waves at a dielectric interface 3.The slab waveguides 4.Practical waveguide geometries 5.Optical fibers 6.Propagation, modulation, and oscillation in optical dielectric waveguide 7.Resonators and couplers 8.Distributed feedback structures

description.zh: 繞射光學元件是基於光波繞射的原理，以VLSI技術為加工方法，研究如何利用繞射現象設計光學元件來實現各種光學功能。繞射光學元件可以應用在改良光學系統的像差，為特定的波長實現聚光、分光等功能以取代傳統的光學透鏡、分光鏡等，此外利用傅光原理製作出傳統的光學元件無法實現的功能，在近代的光學系統、尤其是微光學系統佔有極重要的地位。本課程中，我們將討論其基本原理、設計方法、以及應用。主要課程內容為：(1)光學繞射原理(2)傅式光學概論(3)繞射光學元件介紹(4)性能分析方法(5)繞射光學元件之設計方法(6)繞射光學元件之應用(7)繞射光學元件之製作
description.en: Diffractive optical element (DOE) is based on optical wavefront diffraction on a phase profile that is commonly generated by VLSI techniques. DOE's can be applied on conventional optical systems as well as advanced opto-electronic systems. In this course, we will discuss in detail the basic pricioples, design methods, and others about DOE's. The following topics will be introduced:(1)Introduction to Diffraction theory(2)Overview of Fourier optics(3)Diffractive optical elements (DOE's)(4)Performance evaluation of DOE's(5)Design methods for DOE's(6)Applications of DOE's(7)Fabrication tecjniqies of DOE's
